## üìñ Documentation Files

### 1. **README.md** (900+ lines)
**Main package documentation**

**Contents:**
- Why use this library (problem/solution)
- Installation instructions
- 30-second quick start
- Complete feature guide with examples
- Real-world use cases (5 scenarios)
- Advanced configuration
- Performance tips
- Troubleshooting
- API reference
- Best practices

**Target Audience:** All users - from beginners to advanced

---

### 2. **CONFIGURATION_AND_FILTERING_GUIDE.md** (700+ lines)
**Complete configuration and filtering reference**

**Contents:**
- All configuration options explained
- 3 connection methods (Module, Service, URL)
- SAP module mapping (50+ modules)
- Complete OData filter syntax
- 30+ filter operators with examples
- String, date, arithmetic functions
- 7 advanced real-world examples
- Filter operators quick reference table
- Best practices
- Troubleshooting

**Target Audience:** Users who need detailed configuration and filtering help

---

### 3. **LOGGING_GUIDE.md** (500+ lines) ‚≠ê NEW
